job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T09:19:00.000Z", "description": "Job Description

Ensure production reliability, quality for our suite of applications by working with SRE and support engineers

Understand functional/technical implementation of our apps and setup proactive alerts based on that to avoid user impact

Organize/Lead incident free deployments with thorough scrutiny working with ops, support, engineering and SRE teams

Continously evaluate user traffic, usage patterns , system performance and derive plans for optimization accordingly

Manage and drive critical incidents to resolution without delays by working with all involved internal teams/external teams with prioritizing customer impact always

Must be an expert in Splunk, AppDynamics, Linux and related scripting

Experience in systems both on-premise (data center) and on public cloud (AWS, GCP etc)

Excellent troubleshooting and problem solving skills", "employmentType": "CONTRACTOR", "hiringOrganization": {"@type": "Organization", "name": "Veear Projects Inc.", "sameAs": "https://www.linkedin.com/company/veear-projects-inc-", "logo": "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH0fKyO2P28sw/company-logo_200_200/0/1519913370100?e=1637193600&v=beta&t=EeFi1l9KniAJisoSa7RtNuK-YaSnSizeh-osDex1H3k"}, "identifier": {"@type": "PropertyValue", "name": "Veear Projects Inc.", "value": "2187-21-00140"}, "image": "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH0fKyO2P28sw/company-logo_100_100/0/1519913370100?e=1637193600&v=beta&t=mosJz0WoCO1s5upxILotdCKgWZnrDTP6pRTw1VYyXrA", "industry": "Consumer Electronics", "jobLocation": {"@type": "Place", "address": {"@type": "PostalAddress", "addressCountry": "US", "addressLocality": "Sunnyvale", "addressRegion": "CA", "postalCode": "94089", "streetAddress": null}, "latitude": 37.373676, "longitude": -122.036575}, "skills": "", "title": "Site Reliability Engineer", "validThrough": "2021-09-16T09:19:00.000Z", "educationRequirements": {"@type": "EducationalOccupationalCredential", "credentialCategory": "bachelor degree"}}
